triples.name: Dialogue system
triples.relevance: The paper develops and evaluates a dialogue dataset for dialogue systems research.

triples.name: Text corpus
triples.relevance: DailyDialog is a new text corpus dataset for multi-turn dialogue research.

triples.name: Sentiment analysis
triples.relevance: The paper manually labels emotions, which is closely related to emotion recognition and sentiment analysis tasks.

triples.name: Query understanding
triples.relevance: The paper labels communication intention, which relates to intent recognition and understanding user intent.

triples.name: Emotion recognition in conversation
triples.relevance: The paper labels emotions in multi-turn dialogues, directly addressing emotion recognition in conversational contexts.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: The paper applies NLP techniques to develop and evaluate dialogue systems and extract semantic meaning from conversations.
